videos.description: Theo Pinson weaves a pass through the lane to Luke Maye for a two-handed flush early in the 1st half against Clemson.
videos.headline: Pinson threads pass to Maye for slam

videos.description: UNC uses great ball movement to set up Theo Pinson for an easy two-handed slam.
videos.headline: Pinson left wide open for dunk

videos.description: UNC's Luke Maye is elbowed in the face by teammate Kenny Williams while they both go for a defensive rebound.
videos.headline: Maye leaves game after taking elbow to the face

videos.description: Behind a season-high 21 points from Cameron Johnson, the No. 15 Tar Heels beat the No. 20 Tigers 87-79, improving to 59-0 all time at home in the series.
videos.headline: UNC remains perfect at home against Clemson
